GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.18.10
GSD.description:
net: bonding: fix use-after-free after 802.3ad slave unbind

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit 2765749def4765c5052a4c66445cf4c96fcccdbc, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 0622cab0341cac6b30da177b0faa39fae0680e71. For more details please see the references link.
